Code: EXEC SQL SELECT '1', t1.NUM_APOLICE, decimal(0,15), t1.RAMO, t1.DTINIVIG, t1.DTTERVIG, t1.SITUACAO FROM seguros.v1endosso t1 WHERE t3.nrcertif = 0 AND t1.num_apolice = t3.num_apolice AND t1.nrendos = 0 AND t2.num_apol_sinistro = t3.num_apol_sinistro AND t2.cod_cliente = :COD_CLIENTE ORDER BY 4, 3 END SQL
